content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To maintain a safe and fun environment for players, customers, and general public, EPAM worked with the client to develop a platform where moderators identify inappropriate user-generated content and prevent it from entering the clients' ecosystem.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":32002,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/98f5ef97-3535-4506-bdf6-8cc1e8b24c4b/9.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/98f5ef97-3535-4506-bdf6-8cc1e8b24c4b/9.JPG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"9.JPG\",\"name\":\"9.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"98f5ef97-3535-4506-bdf6-8cc1e8b24c4b\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":657,\"height\":414},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
